title: One Bed - Jul-Sept Move in with Utilities included!! - No Deposit!
posting_body: 1 unit available for rent now, Jul, Aug & Sept
All 1 bedroom/1 bath apartments on a month to month lease term AVAILABLE NOW!
The Forbes Building is conveniently located on the 39 and 41 bus route on Centre Street in Jamaica Plain.
Each unit includes heat, hot water, electric, and a/c unit

The Forbes Building is located about 15 minutes to downtown Boston, 20 minutes to the Boston Logan Airport, 10 minute walk from Jamaica Pond and Whole Foods and steps away from some of the most delicious restaurants in JP.
*Not Actual Unit for Rent - Floor plan and some finished the same.
Kitchen cabinets and countertops will differ (will be grey colored).
